title: Fall 2024 Lipstick Challenge, Day 1!
description: I’m challenging myself to wear lip color everyday this week! I got started a little early yesterday with a MAC liquid lipstick called A Little Tamed. Do you want to join me? I’m setting the bar pretty low and giving myself the option of wearing the same color a few times, but I’m hoping that I’ll feel motivated to do a new color every day. html:
October 14th, 2024 by 5 Comments

I’m challenging myself to wear lip color everyday this week! I got started a little early yesterday with a MAC liquid lipstick called A Little Tamed.

Do you want to join me? I’m setting the bar pretty low and giving myself the option of wearing the same color a few times, but I’m hoping that I’ll feel motivated to do a new color every day.

Your friendly neighborhood beauty addict,

Karen
